inclusion.criterion: present for ablation with paroxysmal or persistent atrial fibrillation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: symptomatic with their AF as noted by their inability to perform their daily activities due to shortness of breath, fatigue, palpitations or other debilitating symptoms
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: present with long standing persistent atrial fibrillation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with the complaint of empty scrotum at the right side.
